content: an easy asymmetrical shawl pattern designed for one skein of any sock yarn beginner friendly this pattern was created to be super simple and comforting when you want to knit without having to think it is easy to memorize so you can knit while visiting riding in the car or when you need to relax with your favorite coffee uses one skein of any sock yarn or more for a larger shawl size 4 needles 24 or longer tapestry needle optional locking stitch marker and/or regular stitch marker
